tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: TF2 - Cow Mangler 5000 Soldier - Mann vs Machine Team Coop Gameplay Commentary
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: ►►► Enjoyed the video? Subscribe! goo.gl ◄◄◄ If you would leave a +rating on the video, that really helps me out! Boo - www.youtube.com St3alth - www.youtube.com Jerma - www.youtube.com Etalyx - www.youtube.com Twitter - twitter.com Facebook - facebook.com Steam Group - steamcommunity.com TF2: Cow Mangler 5000 Soldier - Mann vs Machine Team Coop Gameplay Commentary

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: It also refills the clips, which is extremely helpful with slow reload guns in situations where you don't have time﻿ to reload.
But for some reason everyone thinks there﻿ is.
It also refills ammo in﻿ clip, so this is reasonable.
Lies, obvious 10 year old.﻿
Gray Mann.﻿
... gray mann is the boss god dammit, he﻿ MADE the robots.
I hope you﻿ get "exited".
still refills﻿ the ammo so you dont have to reload
well, it also fills﻿ your magazine.
there﻿ is no boss just a tank.

You fucking idiot. Do you genuinely believe that we're going to fall for that crock of shit? ﻿ Anyway, the mechanical equivalent of the Engie is the sentry buster, since that pertains to him more than any other robot "class". Quit bullshitting.

The boss isn't Grey Mann, the closest thing to a boss is a 4 tank wave. Saying Grey Mann someone who would come out and fight is like saying you have to fight Saxton or Redmond and Blu Mann after﻿ each game.
seems﻿ legit
I think he was just﻿ kidding
The boss is someone called Gray Mann. It﻿ tells you on the mann vs machine section on the tf2 website.
I know who Gray Mann is, I saw the Mann brothers get killed, I saw Saxton﻿ vs the Yeti, but I've seen nothing of any boss.
SHUT THE FUCK UP 10000 PEOPLE﻿ HAVE TOLD ME ALREADY DUMB FUCK
He bought reload﻿ SPEED. Not ammo buff..
Grey Mann made the robots to fight for him, if he was﻿ the boss it would be nonsense.
It's﻿ still a melee weapon, and it's still a Soldier weapon, so no, he didn't mean that.
Also what would an engie robot do? The equivalent of the engineer is the﻿ sentry buster because it is counter-productive to him.
hahahaha guess what... the boss is a tank, giant robots, there's﻿ no engi robot
wouldn't the boss﻿ be gray mann hes the guy who made the robots
you can refill the clip in the﻿ cow mangler
Sorry, i call it the equalizer because i have﻿ played for 2 years now and i forget that they added the escape plan and nerfed them

Reviewer.Books: The Secrets of the Immortal Nicholas Flammel
Reviewer.Movies: The Big Bang Theory, Burn Notice, How I met your Mother, The Godfather.
